content:
Exclusion: does the fund use ESG-based negative screening/exclusions in its investment decisions? if yes, provide details.
General integration: does the fund incorporate ESG considerations systematically in its investment decision making process? if yes, provide details.
Positive Screening: does the fund use any positive or best-in-class screening related to ESG in its investment process? if yes, provide details.
Impact investment: does the fund target ESG-oriented sectors (e.g. renewable energy, green housing) or capital market instruments (e.g. green bonds, ESG funds) or markets (emerging and developing economies) in ESG investment? if yes, which sectors?
SDG investment: does the fund consider SDGs in its investment decision process or asset allocation? If so which ones?
Social: Does the fund integrate the social dimension of sustainability into its sustainable investment strategy? (e.g. child labour, diversity, etc) if yes, provide details.
Governance: Does the fund consider governance issues in its investment decisions? (e.g. executive pay, board diversity, tax, etc) If yes, provide details.
